price: O ve orduları, haksız yere yeryüzünde büyüklenmiş ve bize döndürülmeyeceklerini sanmışlardı.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'takbara huwa wajunūduhu fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi waẓannū annahum ilaynā lā yur'jaʿūna
